page.title: 01MAIN FEATURES
page.content: Meir Heath has 9 shops,2 public houses,a recreational area(Grindley Park) which is still being built,a cricket and football club,a church,2 garages and a water tower.It is mainly a housing estate and is 803ft above sea level. Rough Close has a church,a small school and a large common with a small pool. Lightwood is mostly a housing estate and has a public house called "The Seven Stars".Meir has a high school,a primary school and about 5 shops.Meir Park, a large housing and industrial estate,has a church and a public house. Blythe Bridge is a small village.It has a library,police and railway stations,a clinic and a high school.Stallington has a hospital and a small village.
